words.example: The teen was excited to start high school.
words.translation: 那个青少年对开始上高中感到兴奋。

words.example: The store has a limited stock of shoes.
words.translation: 这家商店的鞋子库存有限。

words.example: She is undergoing training to become a nurse.
words.translation: 她正在接受护士的培训。

words.example: He has good credit at the bank.
words.translation: 他在银行的信用很好。

words.example: The main point of the meeting was clear.
words.translation: 会议的主要目的是明确的。

words.example: Science has improved our understanding of the universe.
words.translation: 科学提高了我们对宇宙的理解。

words.example: The men worked together to finish the project.
words.translation: 这些男人一起完成了项目。

words.example: The advanced technology was impressive.
words.translation: 先进的技术令人印象深刻。

words.example: They moved to the west coast last year.
words.translation: 他们去年搬到了西海岸。

words.example: Our team won the championship.
words.translation: 我们的队伍赢得了冠军。

words.example: He inherited a large estate from his uncle.
words.translation: 他从叔叔那里继承了一大笔财产。

words.example: You can select your preferred option.
words.translation: 你可以选择你喜欢的选项。

words.example: He is openly gay and lives in New York.
words.translation: 他公开是同性恋并住在纽约。

words.example: The thread of the conversation was lost.
words.translation: 谈话的主线被打断了。

words.example: She wrote a quick note before leaving.
words.translation: 她在离开前写了一张便条。

words.example: They live in a small town.
words.translation: 他们住在一个小镇。

words.example: The room has a large window.
words.translation: 房间里有一扇大窗户。

words.example: The art gallery is showcasing new exhibits.
words.translation: 艺术画廊正在展出新的展览品。

words.example: However, I still have some doubts.
words.translation: 然而，我仍然有些疑虑。

words.example: We have a vacation planned for June.
words.translation: 我们计划在六月度假。

words.example: The event is scheduled for October.
words.translation: 这次活动定在十月。

words.example: November is often cold in our city.
words.translation: 十一月我们这里通常很冷。

words.example: The market is very crowded on weekends.
words.translation: 周末市场非常拥挤。

words.example: She borrowed a book from the library.
words.translation: 她从图书馆借了一本书。

words.example: I really like this movie.
words.translation: 我真的很喜欢这部电影。

words.example: The government took swift action.
words.translation: 政府迅速采取了行动。

words.example: The TV series was a big hit.
words.translation: 这部电视剧非常受欢迎。

words.example: The architect built a model of the building.
words.translation: 建筑师制作了一个建筑模型。

words.example: The phone has many advanced features.
words.translation: 这款手机有很多先进功能。

words.example: The air quality in the city is poor.
words.translation: 城市的空气质量很差。

words.example: The tech industry is rapidly growing.
words.translation: 科技行业正在快速发展。

words.example: We need to make a plan for the weekend.
words.translation: 我们需要为周末制定一个计划。

words.example: Human rights must be protected.
words.translation: 人权必须得到保护。

words.example: You can attend the meeting, provided you are on time.
words.translation: 如果你准时，你可以参加会议。

words.example: I watched a TV show last night.
words.translation: 我昨晚看了一部电视节目。

words.example: A password is required to access the system.
words.translation: 需要密码才能访问系统。

words.example: I'll be with you in a second.
words.translation: 我马上就来。

words.example: She bought new accessories for her phone.
words.translation: 她给她的手机买了新配件。

words.example: The cost of living is rising.
words.translation: 生活成本在上升。

words.example: The movie was a box-office success.
words.translation: 这部电影票房大卖。

words.example: The soldiers began their march at dawn.
words.translation: 士兵们在黎明开始行军。

words.definition: 洛杉矶 (Los Angeles 的简称)
words.example: She lives in LA.
words.translation: 她住在洛杉矶。

words.example: School starts in September.
words.translation: 学校九月开学。

words.example: I feel better today than yesterday.
words.translation: 我今天感觉比昨天好。

words.example: It’s very hot in July.
words.translation: 七月非常热。

words.example: I’m going to the store.
words.translation: 我正要去商店。

words.example: He is studying medical science.
words.translation: 他正在学习医学。

words.example: The event will take place in Dec.
words.translation: 该活动将在十二月举行。

words.example: The server is down due to maintenance.
words.translation: 服务器因维护而关闭。

words.example: I need to upgrade my PC.
words.translation: 我需要升级我的电脑。

words.example: She is studying for her exams.
words.translation: 她正在为考试学习。

words.example: He submitted his job application yesterday.
words.translation: 他昨天提交了求职申请。

words.example: I added the item to my cart.
words.translation: 我把物品加到了购物车里。

words.example: The hotel staff was very helpful.
words.translation: 酒店的员工非常乐于助人。

words.example: She wrote several articles for the magazine.
words.translation: 她为杂志写了几篇文章。

words.example: San Francisco is a popular tourist destination.
words.translation: 旧金山是一个受欢迎的旅游胜地。

words.example: We will meet again tomorrow.
words.translation: 我们明天将再次见面。

words.example: The company is facing several issues.
words.translation: 公司正面临一些问题。

words.example: She was born in April.
words.translation: 她出生在四月。

words.example: He never misses a deadline.
words.translation: 他从不错过最后期限。

words.example: The app has over a million users.
words.translation: 这款应用有超过一百万用户。

words.example: She completed the project on time.
words.translation: 她按时完成了项目。

words.example: The street was crowded with people.
words.translation: 街上挤满了人。

words.example: The topic of the discussion was climate change.
words.translation: 讨论的话题是气候变化。

words.example: She left a comment on the post.
words.translation: 她在帖子上留下了评论。

words.example: The financial report was released yesterday.
words.translation: 财务报告昨天发布了。

words.example: She bought a few things at the store.
words.translation: 她在商店买了一些东西。

words.example: He is working on a new project.
words.translation: 他正在做一个新项目。

words.example: They voted against the proposal.
words.translation: 他们投票反对该提案。

words.example: The product meets international standards.
words.translation: 该产品符合国际标准。

words.example: They raised the tax on tobacco.
words.translation: 他们提高了烟草税。

words.example: The person you are looking for is not here.
words.translation: 你要找的人不在这里。

words.example: The temperature is below freezing.
words.translation: 温度在零度以下。

words.example: She forgot her mobile at home.
words.translation: 她把手机忘在家里了。

words.example: I have less time today than yesterday.
words.translation: 我今天的时间比昨天少。

words.example: I got a new phone last week.
words.translation: 我上周买了一个新手机。

words.example: He writes a popular blog about technology.
words.translation: 他写了一个受欢迎的科技博客。

words.example: She threw a big party for her birthday.
words.translation: 她为自己的生日举办了一个大型聚会。

words.example: The gym has all the latest equipment.
words.translation: 健身房有所有最新的设备。

words.example: She is a college student.
words.translation: 她是一名大学生。

words.example: Let me help you with that.
words.translation: 让我来帮你吧。

words.example: The company offers various training programs.
words.translation: 公司提供各种培训项目。

words.example: The store offers discounts on all items.
words.translation: 该商店所有商品打折。

words.example: It’s important to know your legal rights.
words.translation: 知道你的法律权利很重要。

words.example: The temperature is above average today.
words.translation: 今天的温度高于平均水平。

words.example: His recent work has received critical praise.
words.translation: 他的最近的作品得到了评论家的赞扬。

words.example: We had a picnic in the park.
words.translation: 我们在公园里野餐。

words.example: Many stores are offering holiday sales.
words.translation: 许多商店正在进行节日促销。

words.example: He sat by her side during the meeting.
words.translation: 会议期间他坐在她旁边。

words.example: The act of kindness made her day.
words.translation: 那个善举让她的一天变得美好。

words.example: The problem was solved quickly.
words.translation: 问题很快解决了。

words.example: She wore a red dress to the party.
words.translation: 她穿了一件红色连衣裙去参加聚会。

words.example: Please give me your contact information.
words.translation: 请给我你的联系信息。

words.example: The memory of that day still haunts her.
words.translation: 那天的回忆仍然困扰着她。

words.example: His performance in the play was outstanding.
words.translation: 他在剧中的表演非常出色。

words.example: Social media is a powerful tool for communication.
words.translation: 社交媒体是一个强大的交流工具。

words.example: The event is planned for August.
words.translation: 该活动计划在八月举行。
